subject: Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: Carolina Kostner of Italy won the women’s figure skating title yesterday at the NHK Trophy in Sendai, Japan. Miki Ando, last year’s world champion, was fourth and failed to qualify for the Grand Prix final in two weeks in Italy. Earlier, Isabelle Delobel and Olivier Schoenfelder of France won the ice dance.
